snippet: Mr. Searle’s witty illustrations for books, magazine covers, newspaper editorial pages and advertisements helped define postwar graphic humor.
abstract: Ronald Searle, British cartoonist and caricaturist whose outlandishly witty illustrations helped define postwar graphic humor, dies at age 91.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Searle’s witty illustrations for books, magazine covers, newspaper editorial pages and advertisements helped define postwar graphic humor.

headline.seo: Ronald Searle, British Cartoonist, Dies at 91
headline.main: Ronald Searle, Slyly Caustic Cartoonist, Dies at 91
headline.print_headline: Ronald Searle, Slyly Caustic Cartoonist, Is Dead at 91
